Use this plugin to record to an audio clip using a connected microphone. android ios mac pc Creates a new Microphone object. The name of the device. Passing nil or an empty string will pick the default device. Sample rate of the recording. This value should be between 4000 and 44100. Number of channels. This value can be 1 for mono and 2 for stereo. Bits per sample. This value can be 8 or 16.
Sets the output file. If an output file is specified, captured audio is recorded to this file. You cannot set output file while recording. The filename. It should be on documents or temporary directory.
Start recording with device. Stop recording. Dispatched as audio samples become available. The audio channel's peak amplitute. The audio channel's average RMS amplitute.
